mapper.sql: id, sid, name, remark, isdel, discoverid, score, ctime, mtime
mapper.insert:

id,
sid,
name,
remark,
isdel,
discoverid,
score,
ctime,

mapper.update:
update discover_display
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
discoverid = #{discoverid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update discover_display set sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, discoverid = #{discoverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from discover_display order by score asc;
